name: Dont Fail the Course
description:
Welcome to High Score High, the school that perfectly replicates the typical student experience: puzzles and boss fights. With the clock ticking down between each class, our students must sprint from room to room solving puzzles, answering quizzes, and defeating the enemies that wait ready to ruin somebody’s Wednesday. Use power-ups, and sheer willpower to get through the course and make it to the final exam. Will you pass with flying colors? Or is a big F looming in your future?

By the students of the Brock class IASC 3F02.
